Uses of Class
net.xqhs.util.logging.Unit

    • Uses of Unit in net.xqhs.util.logging

      Subclasses of Unit in net.xqhs.util.logging 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  UnitComponent
      A class that extends Unit and exposes the logging and configuration methods.
      class  UnitComponentExt
      The class extends UnitComponent and also implements all methods required by the LoggerClassic interface and expose all methods as public.
      class  UnitExt
      This class extends Unit in order to provide all functionality required by the LoggerClassic interface.
      Fields in net.xqhs.util.logging declared as Unit 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected static Unit MasterLog.masterLog
      The unit which is given as parent to all logs.
      Fields in net.xqhs.util.logging with type parameters of type Unit 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) java.util.Set<Unit> Unit.childrenUnits
      The units having this unit as parent.
      (package private) java.util.Set<Unit> Unit.parentUnits
      The parent units, which may influence the log level or highlighting.

      Adds an output to the log.

      protected Unit Unit.removeAllOutputs()
      Removes all outputs of the log.
      protected Unit Unit.removeAllParentUnits()
      Removes all links to parent units.
      protected Unit Unit.removeOutput​(net.xqhs.util.logging.output.LogOutput logOutput)
      Removes a log output.
      protected Unit Unit.setHighlighted()
      Sets this log as highlighted.
      protected Unit Unit.setLogEnsureNew()
      If called, when the log is created, if another log exists with the same name, an error will be produced.
      protected Unit Unit.setLoggerType​(LogWrapper.LoggerType loggerType)
      Sets the type of the logging infrastructure and wrapper used by this unit.
      protected Unit Unit.setLogLevel​(Logger.Level logLevel)
      Sets the level (and also its proper level) of the log, as one of Logger.Level.
      protected Unit Unit.setNotHighlighted()
      Sets this log as not highlighted.
      protected Unit Unit.setPerformanceMode​(boolean performance)  
      protected Unit Unit.setUnitName​(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of the unit (and therefore of the log).
      protected Unit Unit.setUnitName​(java.lang.String name, boolean postfix, boolean useLongClassName)
      Sets the name of the unit (and therefore of the log).
      private Unit Unit.setUnitName​(java.lang.String name, boolean addClassName, boolean postfix, boolean useLongClassName)
      Aggregates parameters from the two other version of the method.
